Posts.Content: Thanks for posting the link very helpful. Frances xx
Posts.Title: I finally found a comfy bra:)

Posts.Content: Hi Debs,  Hope you don't mind me bothering you but I was so relieved to read your reply - I haven't had a mastectomy but as I've healed the size difference has become more and more noticeable - just wondered have you used any thing other than a knitted knocker and did it do the job? Thanks for your help - worried about going back to work looking so lopsided !!! (Work in a school and kids notice everything!) xx Frances xx
Posts.Title: I finally found a comfy bra:)

Posts.Content: Congratulations, have a fantastic day with lots of "happy" tears.  Thank you for sharing xx
Posts.Title: Good News Story for a cold Tuesday

Posts.Content: Hi, I'm 50 but also noticed an indentation which unfortunately turned out to be BC but as already said that doesn't mean it will be in your wife's case - I did manage to find some Facebook images when I googled which sent me to the doctors - I haven't been near google since - funnily enough none of mine showed on the mammogram - tell her not to worry if she has to have the biopsies - as everyone says the worst part is the waiting so anything to distract and fill the time helps - hoping for good news for you both xx take care, frances x
Posts.Title: Indentation

Posts.Content: Dear Terry and Chris, Thank you for the update - I had been wondering how you had got on. Wonderful to hear such happy news - I hope you thoroughly enjoyed the lunch with fizz. All the best for the future. Frances xx
Posts.Title: Indentation

Posts.Content: Great news I hope that's lifted your spirits after such an anxious time.  Big hugs xx
Posts.Title: It doesn't get any easier.....
